name: Motor Madness
description:
Manage your own garage without spinning out of control!

As chief mechanic at your own garage, you will need to manage your customers' needs without any mishaps! Send cars to 7 different workshops, including tire check, oil change and transmission replacement.

Be quick and efficient! Impatient customers will leave and ruin your reputation. No need to panic; offer them a free car wash to calm them down!
Optimize car service routes and avoid collisions and you will be rewarded with generous tips!

Who’s the best mechanic?

Features list:
•Original 2D graphics.
•Simple and addictive gameplay.
•3 levels of difficulty.
•7 different workshops: engine, brakes and more.
•Complete the challenges and climb the rankings with the social features.
